divs: sighting detailsi am reporting a sighting on july 2, 2012 at approx 9:pm, first sighted in the south\southeast and later moved and disappeared in that general direction. it was a glowing orange color, like a mercury light and the shape was like the traditional domed saucer. it caught my eye because it stopped and stood still for a while and then slowly disappeared. it had to be fairly good size because it was a long way up, and it got smaller and smaller as it trended southeast. the night was very clear. no clouds. this area is a flight path for charlotte, nc airport and i have seen many types of airplanes, helicopters, etc. pass over.
